item.description:
Join us across I-90, South of Washington!

Be a part of a series of art-inspired networking events. Discuss aesthetic, craft and talent by crawling with fellow artists and architects as part of larger open artist studio events. After visiting local studios, the party will head somewhere nearby for food or drinks.

Meet in South End Artist Guild Studios' main lobby (450 Harrison Ave.) at 6:15 pm.

This is a First Friday Open Studio Event. For more information contact Rebecca McWilliams at rmcwilliams[at]smma.com.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in South End Artist Guild Studios' main lobby (450 Harrison Ave.) at 6:15 pm.
item.name: Architects and Artists Collaborate: SoWA Open Studio Crawl
